name: AI Mojo – ChatGPT / GPT-3 Playground for WordPress
author: WPAIMojo

sections.description:
The problem with creating your content for your WordPress site is that you can spend hours, days, weeks, months, or years working on it, and you never know if it will be good enough to get traffic to your site.

If you don’t have time to create it yourself, and you’re not willing to pay for someone to do it, how are you going to find a way to make the kind of content that will attract readers and viewers to your site?

Well, You don’t have to be a pro writer to generate excellent content. You can use content generation AI (like GPT-3 or Jurassic-1) to write content for you and spend more time doing what you love and less editing and publishing.

With AI Mojo, now you can use state-of-the-art AI technology, like GPT-3 & Jurassic-1, to write the best copy or blog post for you… without any of the struggle of actually writing it.

Just tell the AI what you want, and it’ll do the rest.

HOW IT WORKS?

NOTE: This is a Bring-Your-Own-Key (BYOK) application, meaning you must have your own OpenAI / AI21 Studio API key to use this plugin.

  1. You first need to sign up for an account at OpenAI or AI21 Studio to get the API key for their AI engines (GPT-3 or Jurassic-1).

  2. You’ll need to insert the API key into AI Mojo to connect your WordPress site with the AI engine of your choice.

  3. Once your site is connected, you can go to the post editor to generate content. Give the AI a simple instruction like “Write an article outline about (fill in the blank).” Or, “Write three headlines for (your topic)”, and the AI will begin writing the content for you.

That’s it!

To conclude the process, you read the content the AI has generated, make any minor tweaks you may need, and then publish it.

This is THE fastest way to create content from scratch!

This plugin is free.

You only need to pay for API calls to OpenAI / AI21 Studio.

No more paying for the middle-man, and go directly to the source.

Try it out for yourself now.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the downloaded zip file.
  2. Upload the plugin folder into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress site.
  3. Activate AI Mojo from Plugins page
sections.faq:
Can I use this plugin without the access to ChatGPT / GPT-3 / Jurassic-1 API?

No you can’t. You must sign up for an account at OpenAI or AI21 Studio to get their respective API key in order to use this plugin.

Can I use this plugin in classic editor?

No you can’t. This plugin is only compatible with the new block editor.
sections.screenshots:
1. Playground Settings

  2. Content Generated

  3. Content Options

  4. Template Settings

  5. Template Editor
sections.reviews:
Excellent for generating content

By chillmen on June 10, 2023

I've tested some AI plugins not all, and i love this one, it's well done and very simple to use. There is few settings, and some templates.
You can add multiple Persona and select default one.
If you are looking for an AI assistant to write content try it.

Great Plugin

By blissnr on January 30, 2023

AI Mojo certainly offers more flexibility than most, if not all, of its competitors. It is pleasant to use and quite stable. Unfortunately, it lacks any kind of compatibility with the classic editor, which is very frustrating.

Amazing, beyond what I imagined possible!

By (paulallison) on January 16, 2023

First, it allows youth in schools where OpenAI is blocked to be able to use the tools without having to create accounts using their phones! Next it provides a supervised experience for them. The templates have become my most used pedagogical tool. The teachers and students I work with are thrilled to have this context to enter the AI world together!

Fantastic

By mrandrixx on January 8, 2023

I have not found another plugin as good as this one. I might suggest having the ability to generate tags to make it more complete, but as it stands it's already 10/10.

One question, is it possible to create articles in other languages?

A really solid OpenAI integration plugin for content generation

By Luke Cavanagh (lukefiretoss) on January 3, 2023

A really solid OpenAI plugin I've used the OpenAI plugin for a while now and it's really solid. I've found it to be really easy to use and it's helped me a lot in my own projects.

Sensacional - Amazing

By imoxs on November 29, 2022

I'll give it 5 stars for ease of installation and operation Free and lightweight super lightweight. I would like to make a suggestion if possible. somehow integrate the translator or provide the option to translate the text into the desired language. It would also be important to let you know if there is any limit on the use of the operation and if there is any way to keep it working... Vou dar 5 estrelas pela facilidade de instalação e operação Gratuito e leve super leve. gostaria de dar uma sugestão se fosse possivel. integrar de alguma maneira o tradutor ou fornecer a opção de traduzir o texto para a linguagem desejada. seria importante também avisar se tem algum limite de utilização de operação e se tem alguma forma de manter funcionando...

Awesome plugin - but ...

By kailonka on November 11, 2022

Awesome plugin, well done. Thanks. Unfortunately the last update resulted in a whit screen = critical error Had to disable all plugins via FTP and reactivate all one by one. Obvsly I did not reactive AI Mojo. Maybe something to look into.....

What an amazing plugin.

By v7web on October 4, 2022

This plugin is just awesome.

This is awesome

By ettienne777 on September 6, 2022

I am surprised that this plugin does not have any ratings yet since it's fantastic. I am really grateful to the developers for making this, even though you need to pay OpenAI it is still much cheaper than paying for this functionality at a middle man. The thing is that you can literally create a ton of new content almost at the snap of a finger. Brilliant!

short_description: Your "Writer's Toolkit" to automatically write blog posts and other content for your WordPress site…with zero effort!
